name: Zero P - Audio Adventure
description:
AUDIO REQUIRED: Headphones recommended, loud noise warning.

Disclaimer: There is no profanity, but there is a lot of gore depicted through audio.

This is a weirdly paced, no-visual interactive story that takes about 5-6 minutes to complete, assuming you don't die. I went for hyper-realistic audio, which was quite the undertaking. There are improvements to be made in several areas, but this is what I could do in the span of a week. Decisions are time sensitive! You currently can only restart after dying, but I may update that before the jam is over. This game is not hard by any means, but you can effectively choose who lives and dies in the game. I hope you enjoy~

Credit: 

Sound Effects: Me, Soniss Sounds, Free Sounds

Voice Acting: My Friends, Me

Everything Else: Me

Update: Done a little over an hour before the jam ends, fixes a couple problems, and allows you to go back when you die, instead of restarting the whole game.
